title: SetClouds​
content: </> WeatherModule.SetClouds( CloudsCover: Number,-- Changes how cloudy the sky is (between 0 and 1) CloudsDensity: Number,-- Changes how strong or thick the clouds are (between 0 and 1) CloudsColor: Color3 -- Changes the color of the clouds ) → () Used to change clouds (cover, density and color).

title: Clear​
content: </> WeatherModule.Clear() → () Will clear the weather of everything. info Does not take any parameters.

title: Storm​
content: </> WeatherModule.Storm() → () Changes the weather to storm. Activates rain. Changes clouds' cover, density and color. Changes Wind's power and speed. info Does not take any parameters.

title: Windy​
content: </> WeatherModule.Windy() → () Plays a wind sound info Does not take any parameters.

title: Cloudy​
content: </> WeatherModule.Cloudy() → () Makes the sky more covered info Does not take any parameters.

title: Rainy​
content: </> WeatherModule.Rainy() → ()  caution Unfinished Activates or deactivates the rain info It is used only for the rain. It does not modify anything related to the sky/clouds

title: Sunny​
content: deprecated in V2 </> This was deprecated in V2 Use `WeatherModule.Clear` instead. WeatherModule.Sunny() → ()

title: GateOpenAnim​
content: </> PropsModule.GateOpenAnim( Handle: Part ,-- Important, it represents the lock of the gate Hinge: Part -- Important, it represents the (often invisible) part the door is attached to (anything attached to it moves accordingly) ) → () Used to animate the opening of a gate (for gates in stables)

title: GateCloseAnim​
content: </> PropsModule.GateCloseAnim( Handle: Part ,-- Important, it represents the lock of the gate Hinge: Part -- Important, it represents the (often invisible) part the door is attached to (anything attached to it moves accordingly) ) → () The same as PropsModule.GateOpenAnim except it closes the gate instead

title: LightSwitch​
content: </> PropsModule.LightSwitch( IsLightOn: Bool-- Important, used to know whether or not the light is on and therefore if the switch should be on On or Off ) → () Used when players interact with a light switch (it animates it)

title: OpenDoor​
content: </> PropsModule.OpenDoor( Hinge: Part -- Important, it represents the (often invisible) part the door is attached to (anything attached to it moves accordingly) ) → () Used to animate a door

title: CloseDoor​
content: </> PropsModule.CloseDoor( Hinge: Part -- Important, it represents the (often invisible) part the door is attached to (anything attached to it moves accordingly) ) → () The same as PropsModule.OpenDoor except it closes the door instead
